attributes.action: Stop the Tories changing animal welfare act!!! All animals are sentient!!!
attributes.additional_details: The list is endless to the suffering that will occur if this is allowed to happen!!!!
attributes.background: As the Tories have now voted that animals are not sentient it is scarily possible that all animal welfare will be ignored. Meaning that animals will endure pain n suffering for no reason. People will not be prosecuted for acts of cruelty, farms will not be regulated, trading will not be regulated.
